Beefy's Profitability Problem.title: Beefy's Profitability Problem
Beefy's Profitability Problem.description: Treatise on the right approach to reinvesting profits in the Beefy DAO, accompanying proposals for a new profit distribution framework and incentives scheme.

Training Wheels Off - Unleashing CLM wit.title: Training Wheels Off - Unleashing CLM with LTIPP on Arbitrum
Training Wheels Off - Unleashing CLM wit.description: Dive into the full launch of the new Cowcentrated Liquidity Manager (CLM), and Beefy's Long Term Incentives Pilot Program campaign taking place on Arbitrum this summer.

Introducing: Staworth.title: Introducing: Staworth
Introducing: Staworth.description: A brief introduction to Staworth Limited - 'staunch advocacy for digital communities'. Read about the principles we're built on and our journey through to launch.

Recursive Returns with Beefy on Fraxtal.title: Recursive Returns with Beefy on Fraxtal
Recursive Returns with Beefy on Fraxtal.description: Celebrating the launch of Beefy on its 26th blockchain - Fraxtal. A deep exploration of the new ecosystem and the philosophy underlying Frax's plans for a future DeFi paradise.

Beefy Annual Report 2023.title: Beefy Annual Report 2023
Beefy Annual Report 2023.description: Concluding the first year of financial reporting for Beefy DAO, the 2023 report highlights the DAO's activities and financial performance over the last 12 months.

Karpatkey DAO: Strategic Significance.title: Karpatkey DAO: Strategic Significance
Karpatkey DAO: Strategic Significance.description: Exploring the launch of Karpatkey DAO, the next chapter for one of the largest Web 3.0 treasury and risk management providers, and reasons for choosing to launch as a DAO in 2024.

The Next Level: ZAP V3 with Beefy × Opti.title: The Next Level: ZAP V3 with Beefy × Optimism × KyberSwap
The Next Level: ZAP V3 with Beefy × Opti.description: Delivering the next generation of accessibility tooling, in tandem with the largest launch campaign we've ever done.

The Next Generation: Crosschain Yield Op.title: The Next Generation: Crosschain Yield Optimization with Beefy x LayerZero x Aura
The Next Generation: Crosschain Yield Op.description: Announcing a paradigm shift in Beefy's product lineup, with the introduction of LayerZero crosschain strategies in partnership with Aura Finance.

Creative Destruction, Concentrated Liqui.title: Creative Destruction, Concentrated Liquidity and Beefy's Next Generation
Creative Destruction, Concentrated Liqui.description: Concentrated liquidity has arrived on Beefy, meaning higher yields and more efficient liquidity than ever before. Learn all about our latest vaults built with Gamma and Algebra.

Safeguarding in Plain Sight: The Beefy T.title: Safeguarding in Plain Sight: The Beefy Timelock Monitor
Safeguarding in Plain Sight: The Beefy T.description: Discover the secrets of Beefy's risk management efforts for yourself with our latest public information feed.
